title: There Are Always Lovers Killing Each Other For Me - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Game Elements   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Multiple Personalities   Murders   Obsessive Love   R*pe   Schemes And Conspiracies   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Shanhu Shu   珊瑚树
description:
As a qualified scourge, Chen Yao Yao is assigned two targets by the system.

Her one and ultimate goal is to arouse the targets’ desire to kill each other. 

Once a loving father and son, now all eyes are on her.

Brothers will whole-heartedly fight to death for her affections.

A loyal pair of best friends are now just scapegoats wrapped around her finger.

Even igniting the wrath of the Emperor for a beauty is inevitable.

Soon, the whole world will be wearing her surname.

–

Chen Yao Yao said: This is not my thing.

But… things seem a bit wrong.

Isn’t that a good game?>
